# JS性能优化

# 避免全局查找

 const globalObj = {
     name:'global',
     type:'javascript'
 }
 function afn(){
     console.time('timeA:')
     console.log(globalObj.name + '::::' + globalObj.type)
     console.timeEnd('timeA:') // 13ms
 }
 afn()
 function bfn(){
     console.time('timeB:')
     const obj = globalObj
     console.log(obj.name + '::::' + obj.type)
     console.timeEnd('timeB:') // 0.05ms
 }
 bfn()

# 字符串连接

```javascript
    let str = ''
    function afn(){
        console.time('timeA:')
        str += 'a'
        str += 'b'
        str += 'c'
        console.timeEnd('timeA:') // => 0.012ms
    }
    afn()
    function bfn(){
        console.time('timeB:')
        str += 'a' + 'b' + 'c' // => 0.004ms
        str = ['a','b','c'].join('') // => 0.7ms
        console.timeEnd('timeB:') 
    }
    bfn()
```
